EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{{Fellow_Application__c.Applicant_First_Name__c}}},
Thank you for submitting an application for Climate Corps! We have received your completed application and will be in touch in December (early application) or January (regular application).
Interviews will begin in December for candidates that apply prior to the early deadline (November 30th). Candidates that apply after November 30th will be interviewed beginning in January 2023. For more information about our recruitment timeline, please visit our website.
You may log back into the portal at any time to update your contact information and resume, and to see the status of your application in the top right-hand corner. Click here < https://environmentaldefensefund.my.site.com/EDFCCFellowPortal/s/login > to log in.
Best,
The Climate Corps China Team
climatecorps@cet.net.cn
